content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. Based on my market research and the current demand for rental properties in the area, I believe a monthly rental price of 1,200 Euros would be reasonable. However, I am open to negotiations and would be willing to discuss a lower price if that is what you are comfortable with. What are your thoughts on this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I think it's a fair price based on the size of the apartment and its location. However, I am looking for a lower price. Can we reach an agreement on 1,000 Euros per month?
name: Max Müller

content: Of course, I am willing to be flexible and negotiate on the rental price. Based on the current demand and the size of the apartment, I could consider lowering the price to 1,000 Euros per month. However, this would be a lower profit margin for me and I would need to consider other factors, such as the length of the lease agreement and any additional fees or charges. Would you be comfortable with a lease agreement of at least 12 months and paying a security deposit of one month? Additionally, would you be willing to sign a contract that outlines the terms and conditions of the lease?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I am comfortable with a lease agreement of at least 12 months and a security deposit of one month. I will sign a contract that outlines the terms and conditions of the lease. I will also pay the rent in advance on a monthly basis. I hope this is acceptable to you.

So, the price is 1,000 Euros per month?
name: Max Müller

content: Yes, that is correct. I am happy to agree to a monthly rental price of 1,000 Euros, as well as the terms and conditions you have outlined. I appreciate your willingness to pay in advance and sign a contract that outlines the terms and conditions of the lease. This will make the process of renting the apartment more straightforward and secure for both of us. I look forward to working with you to make this arrangement a success!
name: Heinrich Heine
